listitem.para: how much Pluto debugging output should be logged. An empty value, or the magic value none, means no debug output (the default). The magic value all means full output. Otherwise only the specified types of output (a quoted list, names without the --debug- prefix, separated by white space) are enabled; for details on available debugging types, see ipsec_pluto8.

A few special debugging options are not included with all and must be specifically added to be enabled. These special values currently are private (for sensitive key material), crypt (for all crypto related operations), whackwatch (to not release the whack when it normally would), and add-prefix (for special prefix pre-pending)
